rules_text:
If this spell was cast from a graveyard, target opponent draws a card.
Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a card with the lowest mana value among the revealed nonland cards.
Jump-start [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]
notes: !rework replace lifeloss with opponent drawing a card on recursion? [DONE]
